name: Vegan Pumpkin Pie Bars
description: Easy to throw together, these vegan pumpkin pie bars are perfect for when you don't want to make an actual pumpkin pie but still want to have the same flavor. The homemade almond flour crust holds together well and is the perfect base for the dairy-free pumpkin pie filling. Serve as is or topped with coconut cream!

video.name: VEGAN PUMPKIN PIE BARS | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Pumpkin Pie Bars
Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-pumpkin-pie-bars/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Easy to throw together, these vegan pumpkin pie bars are perfect for when you don’t want to make an actual pumpkin pie but still want to have the same flavor. The homemade almond flour crust holds together well and is the perfect base for the dairy-free pumpkin pie filling. Serve as is or topped with coconut cream!

Subtly spiced and perfectly sweet, these easy vegan pumpkin pie bars are perfect for all gatherings and parties around Thanksgiving. You have all the flavor of pumpkin pie without the fuss of traditional pie crust.

If you’re looking for a convenient fall dessert recipe, I’ve got you covered. These pumpkin pie bars are like pumpkin pie but so much easier to make! The homemade pumpkin pie filling is smooth, creamy, and seasoned with plenty of pumpkin spice and rests on a simple almond flour crust. They had topped with cinnamon sugar for some extra. Utterly irresistible!

recipeIngredient: 2.5 tbsp brown sugar or coconut sugar
1 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1/3 cup cashews  (, soaked in hot water for at least 20 minutes.)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the crust: In a bowl, mix the almond flour, flour, salt, cinnamon and sugar unil well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the crust: In a bowl, mix the almond flour, flour, salt, cinnamon and sugar unil well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil and mix in until the mixture resenbles crumbs, and is slightly sticky. It wont be very sticky, but it will stick really well when it bakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil and mix in until the mixture resenbles crumbs, and is slightly sticky. It wont be very sticky, but it will stick really well when it bakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer this mixture to a parchment lined 9x5 inch loaf pan, and press evenly using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer this mixture to a parchment lined 9x5 inch loaf pan, and press evenly using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, make the pumpkin pie layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, make the pumpkin pie layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Filling: Blend all of the ingredients untl the cashews are broken down and already creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Filling: Blend all of the ingredients untl the cashews are broken down and already creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: You may need to add 1-2 tbsp of non-dairy milk, depending on your blender, and the moisture content in the pumpkin puree for the mixture to blend into a smooth state.
recipeInstructions.name: You may need to add 1-2 tbsp of non-dairy milk, depending on your blender, and the moisture content in the pumpkin puree for the mixture to blend into a smooth state.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the loaf pan out of the oven, transfer the blended pumpkin mixture into the pan and even it out. You can also top this with 2 tsp of sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon for a cinnamon sugar topping.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the loaf pan out of the oven, transfer the blended pumpkin mixture into the pan and even it out. You can also top this with 2 tsp of sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon for a cinnamon sugar topping.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the loaf pan back in the oven and bake for 35-45 minutes, or until the top layer is set. Check in the center, the pumpkin layer should not be jiggly.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the loaf pan back in the oven and bake for 35-45 minutes, or until the top layer is set. Check in the center, the pumpkin layer should not be jiggly.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the loaf pan from the oven and let it cool completely before removing from the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the loaf pan from the oven and let it cool completely before removing from the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill the bars for at least an hour and then slice and serve.The bars can be stored in the refrigerator for 5 days
recipeInstructions.name: Chill the bars for at least an hour and then slice and serve.The bars can be stored in the refrigerator for 5 days

keywords: easy pumpkin pie bars, pumpkin pie bar recipe, vegan pumpkin bars
